quoteText: BY USING THE DISCOGS WEBSITE AND AFFILIATED WEBSITES, YOU ARE INDICATING YOUR AGREEMENT TO BE BOUND BY ALL OF THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THE TOS.
title: Users are subject to the policies and guidelines of the service.

tosdr.case: Users are subject to the policies and guidelines of the service.
tosdr.tldr:
The ToS state under "ACKNOWLEDGMENT AND ACCEPTANCE OF TERMS OF SERVICE":
"[...] BY USING THE DISCOGS WEBSITE AND AFFILIATED WEBSITES, YOU ARE INDICATING YOUR AGREEMENT TO BE BOUND BY ALL OF THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THE TOS. "
